General.Name: BNP Paribas Bank Polska S.A.
General.Description: BNP Paribas Bank Polska S.A. provides a range of banking products and services in Poland. It operates through Retail and Business Banking; Small and Medium Enterprises; Corporate Banking; Corporate and Institutional Banking; and Other Banking activities segments. The company offers current, savings, and deposit accounts, and term deposits; housing, mortgage, cash, car, micro enterprise, and investment loans; revolving overdrafts; debit and credit cards. It provides cash transfer, foreign exchange, insurance, wealth management; cash management and trade finance, import and export letter of credit, bank guarantee and documentary collection, supply chain and exports financing, derivative, corporate finance, leasing, factoring, real estate and structured finance, investment banking and related, brokerage, and other financial services. The company offers its products to retail customers, consumers, large and medium-sized enterprises, as well as local government entities and entities operating in multinational enterprises. The company was formerly known as Bank BGZ BNP Paribas S.A. and changed its name to BNP Paribas Bank Polska S.A. in 2019. BNP Paribas Bank Polska S.A. was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland. BNP Paribas Bank Polska S.A. operates as a subsidiary of BNP Paribas SA.

1.Name: Mr. Francois  Benaroya
1.Title: Head of Retail & Banking, Head of Integrate, Strategy & Dev and Vice Chairman of Supervisory Board

2.Name: Mr. Wojciech  Kemblowski
